holidays.name: Embrace Your Geekness Day
holidays.description: A day to proudly celebrate your inner geek and all things nerdy, from comics and video games to science and fantasy novels.
holidays.origin: Started by internet communities wanting to promote geek culture and self-acceptance in the mid-2000s.
holidays.funFact: The phrase 'geek chic' became popular around this day, celebrating how geek culture has influenced fashion and style.

holidays.name: National Vanilla Ice Cream Day
holidays.description: A deliciously simple day dedicated to enjoying the classic and beloved vanilla ice cream flavor in all its creamy glory.
holidays.origin: Unofficial American food holiday created by ice cream enthusiasts and social media users.
holidays.funFact: Despite being the ‚Äòplainest‚Äô flavor, vanilla is actually one of the most labor-intensive and costly flavors to produce due to vanilla bean cultivation.

holidays.name: Beautiful Jest Day
holidays.description: An oddball day celebrated mainly online where people share clever jokes, puns, and witty humor that are both beautiful and silly.
holidays.origin: Birthed by a small humor website in the early 2010s aiming to spread smiles with lighthearted jesting.
holidays.funFact: This day encourages sharing ‚Äòbeautiful jests,‚Äô which are jokes that are simultaneously clever, kind, and uplifting‚Äînot mean spirited!

holidays.name: National Hot Dog Day (Variable July Date)
holidays.description: Often celebrated in late July, this is the unofficial day to savor hot dogs in all their glory, from classic to bizarre toppings.
holidays.origin: Popularized by hot dog vendors and food festivals to boost summer sales.
holidays.funFact: Though the date shifts, many places choose July 23 as a perfect hot dog celebration day in summer heat.
